data.name: One Way Trip
data.detailed_description:
In space no one can hear you scream... except for your friends.


One Way Trip is an atmospheric sci-fi horror game that focuses on stealth. With up to 4 players you will be tasked with escaping some sort of otherworldly being. Fighting back is useless, your own chance is to hide. Make your way through various maps, complete objectives, and escape whatever it is that is hunting for you.

They are following you, sensing you, learning from your behaviour...

You face just one threat at a time, but they are constantly on the prowl. The AI learns from your behaviour as it tries to find you. As you spend more time in each level they gets more aggressive, smarter, and more determined to find you. They can see you, hear you, and perhaps even smell you...

There's just one objective; Survive...

Each scenario has the same primary objective; make it out alive. But spread throughout the map are many optional objectives. Completing each objective will earn you more points, but with each completion the enemy becomes more aware of your presence. The more you do, the higher the stakes get. How far are you daring to go?

An atmosphere to die for...

The game takes place in the distant future. Humanity has spread throughout the Milky Way, alien life is yet to be discovered. You are part of a Research Station orbiting a distant planet. You wake up in the middle of your sleep to the sound of screams, followed by nothing but silence. You and your team decide to investigate...

The atmosphere is built to be terrifying. From large open areas to claustrophobic smoke filled pathways, every part of the map is built to make you want to turn back. But will you?

Feature highlights

  • Multiplayer Co-op: The game can be played singleplayer or with up to 4 players.
  • VR Support: The game will feature full VR support at launch, but can also be played without VR. VR and Non-VR player will be able to play together.
  • Immersive gameplay: With realistic graphics, an interactive world, and a terrifying atmosphere you can get truly immersed.
  • Extreme difficulty: The game is meant to be brutally difficult. Gameplay modifiers allow you to customize the difficulty to your desires.
  • High replayability: Multiple enemy types, gameplay modifiers, multiple maps, unpredictable AI, and much more, make sure every experience is unique.

data.short_description: Stealth will be your only defense in this 1-4 player Sci-fi horror scenario while you attempt to escape an ever learning AI. Be quiet, stay hidden, and remain calm, or face certain death.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 6700
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specs in VR may different from Non-VR. Listed specs are for Non-VR.
